exposurecontrol: Program AE; Aperture Priority AE; Shutter Priority AE; Manual
isosensitivity: Auto; ISO 80; ISO 100; ISO 125; ISO 160; ISO 200; ISO 250; ISO 320; ISO 400; ISO 500; ISO 640; ISO 800; ISO 1000; ISO 1250; ISO 1600; ISO 2000; ISO 2500; ISO 3200; ISO 4000; ISO 5000; ISO 6400; ISO 8000; ISO 10000; ISO 12800
features: Wink Detection; Continuous Shooting Mode; Self-timer; Smile Detection; Orientation Sensor; Live View; Face Detection
languagesupported: English; German; French; Dutch; Danish; Finnish; Italian; Norwegian; Swedish; Spanish; Chinese (Simplified and Traditional); Japanese; Russian; Portuguese; Korean; Greek; Polish; Czech; Hungarian; Turkish; Thai; Arabic; Romanian; Ukrainian; Persian; Hindi; Malay; Indonesian; Vietnamese
whitebalancemodes: Auto; Daylight; Cloudy; Tungsten; Fluorescent; Fluorescent H; Flash; Underwater; Custom 1; Custom 2
flashmodes: Auto Flash; Flash ON; Flash OFF; Slow Sync; Red-eye Reduction; Rear Curtain Sync; Flash Exposure Compensation
memorycardsupported: Secure Digital (SD) Card; Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Card; Secure Digital Extended Capacity (SDXC)
